data.content:
interjection
used to express pleasure, surprise, or both pleasure and surprise
Ooh, that feels good.
Ooh, those flowers are beautiful!
verb
oohs; oohed; oohing
[no obj] informal :to express pleasure, surprise, or both pleasure and surprise - used in the phrase ooh and aah
Everyone in the crowd was oohing and aahing at/over the fireworks.
